channel.title: using on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in using on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-02
item.description: Google Soli Radar sees your intentions – and it’s less creepy and more helpful than you think (3 minute read) Google’s ATAP group recently unveiled its latest Soli Radar research project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-17
item.description: Meta’s sci-fi haptic glove prototype lets you feel VR objects using air pockets (6 minute read) Meta has revealed a pair of haptic gloves that lets people feel objects in virtual reality.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-20
item.description: Cameo launches Cameo Calls, a service for fans to video chat with celebs (2 minute read) Cameo Calls lets fans chat one-on-one with influencers and celebrities.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-26
item.description: Google parent Alphabet launches Intrinsic: a new company to build software for industrial robots (3 minute read) Intrinsic is a new company from Alphabet that focuses on building software for industrial robots.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-28
item.description: Apple’s M2 chip has entered production and will ship as soon as July (2 minute read) Apple’s custom-designed M2 chips entered production this month.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-05
item.description: Google Pixel phones will soon track heart rate using only the camera (3 minute read) Google’s latest Pixel-exclusive feature is the ability to track heart rate and respiratory rate using only the existing cameras.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-01
item.description: Apple just paid a record $25 million to buy a Sundance movie (2 minute read) Apple paid roughly $25 million for a movie at the Sundance Film Festival, the largest deal ever at the event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-22
item.description: Pebble founder launches Beeper, a universal chat app that works with iMessage and others (4 minute read) Beeper is a new app that can connect with 15 different messaging services.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-07
item.description: Microsoft Could Bring You Back From The Dead… As A Chat Bot (1 minute read) Microsoft has filed a patent for a method that would use social data such as images, voice data, social media posts, and other written media to build a profile of a person and create a chatbot with the personality of that person.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-28
item.description: Tesla’s new Boombox feature will let car owners fart at unsuspecting neighbors (2 minute read) Tesla has rolled out its 2020.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-05
item.description: Virgin Hyperloop selects West Virginia to test its futuristic transport system (2 minute read) Virgin Hyperloop One will build a $500 million certification center in West Virginia.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-13
item.description: The Pentagon Wants Elon Musk to Yeet Cargo Around the Planet In an Hour (2 minute read) The Pentagon has contracted SpaceX to develop rockets to deliver packages around the planet in under an hour.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-28
item.description: Tesla’s full self-driving Autopilot beta coming in ‘a month or so’ (2 minute read) Elon Musk recently announced that Tesla will release a private beta of the full self-driving version of its Autopilot software in the coming months.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-08
item.description: Minecraft is coming to PlayStation VR as a free upgrade later this month (1 minute read) Minecraft will be playable for free on PlayStation VR later this month.
